title: Sony RMVZ220 Remote Control Up To 4 Compatible Video Components (Black) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
description: Controls Up To 4 Video Components; Streamlined Design, Button Layout & Software; Centrally Located Main Buttons; Compatible With Most Major Brands; Comfortable Ergonomic Design; Low-Cost Replacement For Lost Or Broken Units; 3-Minute Memory Backup; Requires 2 Aa Batteries
